comments: Prof. Endrinal is the best teacher I\'ve ever had. No one is more enthusiastic and knowledgeable about their work than he is. I, like many was devastated when he was let go from Umass Lowell. That was a huge mistake on their behalf.
Awesome professor, loved every class, always brought in different examples from recent years to help us understand the curriculum. I\'m gonna miss him
Show up, do the minimum work, and collect an easy A.
A brilliant, caring teacher...UML is lucky to have him.
Dr. E. is awesome and if you show up you\'ll get a decent grade. Consider who else you would have to take the classes with too!
Dr. Edrinal is really into what he teaches. Pretty easy A too so I highily recommend him!

Dr. E is probably one of the best teachers I\'ve ever had. He\'s very into the class, and very into the students. You have to do homework, I nearly failed cause I didn\'t do it, but it\'s nothing hard. Just pay attention in class and you\'ll be gold. Also, DO NOT miss his "Transformers" lecture. It\'s the best.

Fantastic. I\'ve taken Theory I-III and Aural Skills III and IV with him. In his opinion the class\'s grades are a reflection of his teaching. He\'s not easy but not ridiculously hard either. He grades all the homework assignments so be sure to come prepared! But he\'s a great professor and an awesome guy. I miss his classes now that I\'m done.
I think he\'s pretty easy. Had 2 classes with him and he knows his stuff.

Energetic--I\'ve never seen a professor so invested in the success of his students. Takes your grades personally, and always tries to make sure you know the material before moving on. Very hard to get a bad grade if you keep up with him.
He\'s tough, but he can teach

Dr. E knows exactly how to help students with what they have trouble with. He\'s open to questions, and willing to take extra time if something is troublesome. Plus he makes everything interesting and exciting!
Good teacher!! Everyone like him. He makes time fly in his class. Very funny professor.

This guy is great! Knows exactly what he is doing and loves what he does. He is always enthused about the material. He is helpful and will always be open to help. Just keep up with homework and study for all quizzes and exams.
